templates.template: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:dat="http://datacollections.ws.haojue.com/"> <soapenv:Header /> <soapenv:Body> <dat:resourceDataCollection> <resourceDataRequest> <site>{{site}}</site> <dcGroup>{{dcGroup}}</dcGroup> <user>{{user}}</user> <resource>{{resource}}</resource> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <dataList sxRepeat="item in dataList"> <name>{{item.name}}</name> <value>{{item.value}}</value> </dataList> </resourceDataRequest> </dat:resourceDataCollection> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wor="http://workinprocess.ws.haojue.com/"> <soapenv:Header /> <soapenv:Body> <wor:productArrivalBatch> <workInProcessDataRequest> <site>{{site}}</site> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <dataList sxRepeat="item in dataList"> <operation>{{item.operation}}</operation> <resource>{{item.resource}}</resource> <sfc>{{item.sfc}}</sfc> </dataList> </workInProcessDataRequest> </wor:productArrivalBatch> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wor="http://workinprocesses.ws.haojue.com/"> <soapenv:Header /> <soapenv:Body> <wor:productOutboundBatch>
<workInProcessDataRequest> <site>{{site}}</site> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <dataList sxRepeat="item in dataList"> <operation>{{item.operation}}</operation> <resource>{{item.resource}}</resource> <sfc>{{item.sfc}}</sfc> </dataList> </workInProcessDataRequest> </wor:productOutboundBatch> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wor="http://workinprocesses.ws.haojue.com/"> <soapenv:Header /> <soapenv:Body> <wor:productTransitBatch>
<workInProcessDataRequest> <site>{{site}}</site> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <dataList sxRepeat="item in dataList"> <operation>{{item.operation}}</operation> <resource>{{item.resource}}</resource> <sfc>{{item.sfc}}</sfc> </dataList> </workInProcessDataRequest> </wor:productTransitBatch> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:dat="http://datacollectionandworkinprocesses.ws.haojue.com/"> <soapenv:Header /> <soapenv:Body> <dat:productArrivalDataCollection> <productDataRequest> <site>{{site}}</site> <dcGroup>{{dcGroup}}</dcGroup> <user>{{user}}</user> <operation>{{operation}}</operation> <resource>{{resource}}</resource> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <dataList sxRepeat="item in dataList"> <sfc>{{item.sfc}}</sfc> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <dataList sxRepeat="subItem in item.subDataList"> <name>{{subItem.name}}</name> <value>{{subItem.value}}</value> </dataList> </dataList> </productDataRequest> </dat:productArrivalDataCollection> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:dat="http://datacollectionandworkinprocesses.ws.haojue.com/"> <soapenv:Header /> <soapenv:Body> <dat:productDataCollectionOutbound> <productDataRequest> <site>{{site}}</site> <dcGroup>{{dcGroup}}</dcGroup> <user>{{user}}</user> <operation>{{operation}}</operation> <resource>{{resource}}</resource> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <dataList sxRepeat="item in dataList"> <sfc>{{item.sfc}}</sfc> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <dataList sxRepeat="subItem in item.subDataList"> <name>{{subItem.name}}</name> <value>{{subItem.value}}</value> </dataList> </dataList> </productDataRequest> </dat:productDataCollectionOutbound> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:dat="http://datacollectionandworkinprocesses.ws.haojue.com/"> <soapenv:Header /> <soapenv:Body> <dat:productDataCollectionTransit> <productDataRequest> <site>{{site}}</site> <dcGroup>{{dcGroup}}</dcGroup> <user>{{user}}</user> <operation>{{operation}}</operation> <resource>{{resource}}</resource> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <dataList sxRepeat="item in dataList"> <sfc>{{item.sfc}}</sfc> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <dataList sxRepeat="subItem in item.subDataList"> <name>{{subItem.name}}</name> <value>{{subItem.value}}</value> </dataList> </dataList> </productDataRequest> </dat:productDataCollectionTransit> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wor="http://workcenters.ws.haojue.com/"> <soapenv:Header /> <soapenv:Body> <wor:updateWorkCenterStatus>
<workCenterStatusRequest> <site>{{site}}</site> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <workCenterList sxRepeat="item in workCenterList"> <workCenter>{{item.workCenter}}</workCenter> <resourceStatus>{{item.resourceStatus}}</resourceStatus> </workCenterList> </workCenterStatusRequest> </wor:updateWorkCenterStatus> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:res="http://resources.ws.haojue.com/"> <soapenv:Header /> <soapenv:Body> <res:updateResourceStatus>
<resourceStatusRequest> <site>{{site}}</site> <resource>{{resource}}</resource> <resourceStatus>{{resourceStatus}}</resourceStatus> </resourceStatusRequest> </res:updateResourceStatus> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wor="http://workinprocesses.ws.haojue.com/"> <soapenv:Header /> <soapenv:Body> <wor:productArrivalUnbind> <workInProcessDataRequest> <site>{{site}}</site> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <dataList sxRepeat="item in dataList"> <operation>{{item.operation}}</operation> <resource>{{item.resource}}</resource> <sfc>{{item.sfc}}</sfc> </dataList> </workInProcessDataRequest> </wor:productArrivalUnbind> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wor="http://workinprocesses.ws.haojue.com/"> <soapenv:Header /> <soapenv:Body> <wor:getBarcodeArrival> <getBarcodeArrivalRequest> <site>{{site}}</site> <operation>{{operation}}</operation> <resource>{{resource}}</resource> </getBarcodeArrivalRequest> </wor:getBarcodeArrival> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

template.key: 条码下达装配收数过站

templates.template: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:dat="http://datacollectionandworkinprocesses.ws.haojue.com/"> <soapenv:Header /> <soapenv:Body> <dat:releaseBarcodeAssemblyDataCollectionTransit> <releaseBarcodeDataRequest> <site>{{site}}</site> <dcGroup>{{dcGroup}}</dcGroup> <user>{{user}}</user> <operation>{{operation}}</operation> <resource>{{resource}}</resource> <data> <upperBoxSfc>{{upperBoxSfc}}</upperBoxSfc> <lowerBoxSfc>{{lowerBoxSfc}}</lowerBoxSfc> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <dataList sxRepeat="item in dataList"> <name>{{item.name}}</name> <value>{{item.value}}</value> </dataList> </data> </releaseBarcodeDataRequest> </dat:releaseBarcodeAssemblyDataCollectionTransit> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:dat="http://datacollectionandworkinprocesses.ws.haojue.com/"> <soapenv:Header /> <soapenv:Body> <dat:lineThreeReleaseBarcodeAssemblyDataCollectionTransit> <releaseBarcodeDataRequest> <site>{{site}}</site> <dcGroup>{{dcGroup}}</dcGroup> <user>{{user}}</user> <operation>{{operation}}</operation> <resource>{{resource}}</resource> <data> <upperBoxSfc>{{upperBoxSfc}}</upperBoxSfc> <lowerBoxSfc>{{lowerBoxSfc}}</lowerBoxSfc> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <dataList sxRepeat="item in dataList"> <name>{{item.name}}</name> <value>{{item.value}}</value> </dataList> </data> </releaseBarcodeDataRequest> </dat:lineThreeReleaseBarcodeAssemblyDataCollectionTransit> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wor="http://workinprocesses.ws.haojue.com/"> <soapenv:Header /> <soapenv:Body> <wor:getBoxAssemblyBarcode> <workInProcessSfcDataRequest> <site>{{site}}</site> <operation>{{operation}}</operation> <resource>{{resource}}</resource> <sfc>{{sfc}}</sfc> </workInProcessSfcDataRequest> </wor:getBoxAssemblyBarcode> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wor="http://workinprocesses.ws.haojue.com/"> <soapenv:Header /> <soapenv:Body> <wor:boxAssemblyFramedTransit> <boxAssemblyFramedDataRequest> <site>{{site}}</site> <operation>{{operation}}</operation> <resource>{{resource}}</resource> <sfc>{{sfc}}</sfc> <processLot>{{processLot}}</processLot> </boxAssemblyFramedDataRequest> </wor:boxAssemblyFramedTransit> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wor="http://workinprocesses.ws.haojue.com/"> <soapenv:Header /> <soapenv:Body> <wor:boxAssemblyArrival> <workInProcessSfcDataRequest> <site>{{site}}</site> <operation>{{operation}}</operation> <resource>{{resource}}</resource> <sfc>{{sfc}}</sfc> </workInProcessSfcDataRequest> </wor:boxAssemblyArrival> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wor="http://workinprocesses.ws.haojue.com/"> <soapenv:Header /> <soapenv:Body> <wor:boxAssemblyOutbound> <workInProcessSfcDataRequest> <site>{{site}}</site> <operation>{{operation}}</operation> <resource>{{resource}}</resource> <sfc>{{sfc}}</sfc> </workInProcessSfcDataRequest> </wor:boxAssemblyOutbound> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

template.key: 箱体总成产品收数过站

<releaseBarcodeDataRequest> <site>{{site}}</site> <operation>{{operation}}</operation> <resource>{{resource}}</resource> <upperBoxSfc>{{upperBoxSfc}}</upperBoxSfc> <lowerBoxSfc>{{lowerBoxSfc}}</lowerBoxSfc> </releaseBarcodeDataRequest> </wor:boxAssemblyCheckTransit> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
